main_tasks:
- Work closely with our researchers and product team to design, develop, test, deploy, maintain, and improve new neural network models over standard and edge accelerators

- Build custom loss functions, design complex layers, and manipulate tensors

- Manage individual customer projects. Handle priorities, deadlines, and deliverables, and conduct frequent interactions with our customers’ highly-skilled deep learning engineers

- Build the core software elements that drive the Clika products

- Write clean, efficient, and well-documented code
requirements:
- B.Sc Computer Science or equivalent degree

- Strong team player with excellent communication skills in verbal and written English

- Experience working with Linux

- Experience working with Git

- Experience in developing Deep Learning models (e.g., Object Detection, Classification, Lidar, NLP, GAN, Audio, ...)

- Extensive knowledge of OOP, design patterns, and solid software development principles in Python

- Experience working with at least one major ML framework (Tensorflow/PyTorch)

- Experience implementing advanced ideas from academic papers and turning them into production-ready code
jd:
We’re looking for a deep learning engineer who is versatile, displays leadership qualities, and is keen to take on new challenges. As part of the Clika team, you will gain knowledge and industrial proficiency in a broad spectrum of the most-advanced deep-learning techniques and concepts, while acquiring best practices.


Responsibilities
- Work closely with our researchers and product team to design, develop, test, deploy, maintain, and improve new neural network models over standard and edge accelerators

- Build custom loss functions, design complex layers, and manipulate tensors

- Manage individual customer projects. Handle priorities, deadlines, and deliverables, and conduct frequent interactions with our customers’ highly-skilled deep learning engineers

- Build the core software elements that drive the Clika products

- Write clean, efficient, and well-documented code

Basic Qualifications
- B.Sc Computer Science or equivalent degree

- Strong team player with excellent communication skills in verbal and written English

- Experience working with Linux

- Experience working with Git

- Experience in developing Deep Learning models (e.g., Object Detection, Classification, Lidar, NLP, GAN, Audio, ...)

- Extensive knowledge of OOP, design patterns, and solid software development principles in Python

- Experience working with at least one major ML framework (Tensorflow/PyTorch)

- Experience implementing advanced ideas from academic papers and turning them into production-ready code

Preferred Qualifications
- M.Sc Computer Science or equivalent degree

- Experience developing in C++

- Experience working with PyTorch

Company Benefits
• We are a startup founded by Top MLOps expert from world’s leading autonomous driving solution company. We dig deeply into MLOps, because we will make AI & ML development easy and convenient. 

• We are an international English-speaking company where everyone can express their opinion and thoughts. We encourage self-growth and respect off-work time. 

• You will have the chance to learn from and work with a former top engineer at a worldwide leading Autonomous Driving Solution company.



[Interview Process] 

•45 minutes offline/online interview 

•Technical assessment 

•45 minutes offline/online where we talk about the assessment 

•Decision.


Make sure you:

• Attach CV in English as PDF format.

• Include anything that you think will help us know you better. (e.g., website, blog, GitHub, short letter, etc.)
